content: stitches and pull tight weave end in thumb pick up all stitches on thumb holder arranging the stitches around the needles attach yarn at bridge area knit around place marker if desired to note beginning of round knit 12 rounds or desired length thumb decrease next row *knit 1 knit 2 together repeat from * across the row 9 stitches next row knit around cut yarn leaving a 6 inch tail with darning needles run the yarn through the remaining 9 stitches and pull tight weave end in please use this pattern for pleasure knitting only not for profit enjoy
